title: Shokei Palace
marks:
Signature, Title, Mark, and Inscription

Left ma LRC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}; LLC, in pencil: [Shokei Pa
description: darkened interior of a palace, looking out; a group of women stand near a staircase at L; large columns support the interior; a group of women at R, behind columns, near stone monument; view looks out onto lattice-wall and out into a lush pink and green garden
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
